items.title: Microsoft leads shift beyond data unification to organization, delivering next-gen AI readiness with new Microsoft Fabric capabilities - The Official Microsoft Blog
items.content_text: We’re in a hinge moment for AI. The experiments are over and the real work has begun. Centralizing data, once the finish line, is now the starting point. The definition of “AI readiness” is evolving as increasingly sophisticated agents demand rich, contextualized data grounded in business operations to deliver meaningful results. What sets leaders apart...

items.title: How Prime members can get early tickets for 'Wicked: For Good’ only on Fandango
items.content_text: Prime members will be able to buy tickets to the early screening of ‘Wicked: For Good’ and see it four days before its theatrical release.

items.title: Reaching Across the Isles: UK-LLM Brings AI to UK Languages With NVIDIA Nemotron
items.content_text: Trained on the Isambard-AI supercomputer, UK-LLM enables AI reasoning for Welsh and other UK languages for public services.

items.title: A joint statement from Microsoft and OpenAI - The Official Microsoft Blog
items.content_text: Microsoft and OpenAI have signed a non-binding memorandum of understanding (MOU) for the next phase of our partnership. We are actively working to finalize contractual terms in a definitive agreement. Together, we remain focused on delivering the best AI tools for everyone, grounded in our shared commitment to safety.

items.title: Five Years On, Reels Reigns as India's Top Short-Form Video Platform
items.content_text: Findings from a new Meta-commissioned IPSOS study show that Reels across our platforms is India’s top driver of daily video consumption ahead of other surveyed platforms.

items.title: Flexible work update - The Official Microsoft Blog
items.content_text: Amy Coleman, Executive Vice President and Chief People Officer, shared the below communication with Microsoft employees this morning. How we work has forever changed. I remember starting at Microsoft in the late ‘90s, always in the office, no laptops, and primarily working with the people right down the hall. As technology evolved and our business expanded, we became...

items.title: NVIDIA Partners With AI Infrastructure Ecosystem to Unveil Reference Design for Giga-Scale AI Factories
items.content_text: At this week’s AI Infrastructure Summit in Silicon Valley, NVIDIA’s VP of Accelerated Computing Ian Buck unveiled a bold new vision: the transformation of traditional data centers into fully integrated AI factories. As part of this initiative, NVIDIA is developing reference designs to be shared with partners and enterprises worldwide — offering an NVIDIA Omniverse  Read Article

items.title: Now Live: Europe’s First Exascale Supercomputer, JUPITER, Accelerates Climate Research, Neuroscience, Quantum Simulation
items.content_text: At JUPITER’s inauguration ceremony in Jülich, attended by Germany Chancellor Friedrich Merz, the Jülich Supercomputing Centre and NVIDIA unveiled ways the supercomputer is already spurring innovation across the world.

items.title: Attach Text to Your Threads Posts and Share Longer Perspectives
items.content_text: We're rolling out a way for you to attach up to 10,000 characters of text to a Threads post.

items.title: Instagram Launches A Microdrama Series To Encourage Gen Z To Take Creative Chances
items.content_text: Today, Instagram released a microdrama series in India to inspire Gen Z to take creative risks and bring them together. Titled ‘Party of Two’, the series follows Instagram’s ‘Anyway’ campaign from this year.

items.title: Meta’s Kansas City Data Center and Upcoming AI-Optimized Data Centers
items.content_text: Our Kansas City data center is now operational, representing a $1 billion investment in Missouri and in our global infrastructure that brings our technologies to billions of people worldwide.

items.title: New Instagram Features to Help You Connect
items.content_text: We’re launching features that make it easier to connect with your friends on Instagram.

items.title: Personal Superintelligence for Everyone
items.content_text: Today, Meta Founder & CEO Mark Zuckerberg shared his vision to bring personal superintelligence to everyone.

items.title: You Can Now Edit Videos With Meta AI
items.content_text: We’re launching a generative AI video editing feature across the Meta AI app, the Meta.AI website and the Edits app to help you bring your creative ideas to life.

items.title: AlphaQubit tackles one of quantum computing’s biggest challenges
items.content_text: AlphaQubit is an AI-based decoder that identifies quantum computing errors with state-of-the-art accuracy.

items.title: How to sign up for a free trial of Prime before Prime Big Deal Days 2025
items.content_text: Prime is packed with tons of great benefits—and you can start enjoying them for free today and ahead of Prime Big Deal Days this October.

items.title: What are Amazon Lightning Deals and how to find them
items.content_text: Lightning Deals are limited-time promotions that offer big savings on some of your favorite brands and products.

items.title: How to sign up for a Prime membership ahead of Prime Big Deal Days 2025
items.content_text: Ready to enjoy all the great benefits of a Prime membership? Sign up before October to shop Prime Big Deal Days this year.

items.title: Here’s how much a Prime membership costs, and how to make the most of its benefits in time for Prime Big Deal Days this October
items.content_text: Amazon Prime makes your life more convenient, simple, and fun, while saving you money every single day and during events like Prime Big Deal Days.

items.title: NVIDIA Unveils Rubin CPX: A New Class of GPU Designed for Massive-Context Inference
items.content_text: NVIDIA® today announced NVIDIA Rubin CPX, a new class of GPU purpose-built for massive-context processing. This enables AI systems to handle million-token software coding and generative video with groundbreaking speed and efficiency.

items.title: NVIDIA Announces Financial Results for Second Quarter Fiscal 2026
items.content_text: NVIDIA (NASDAQ: NVDA) today reported revenue for the second quarter ended July 27, 2025, of $46.7 billion, up 6% from the previous quarter and up 56% from a year ago. NVIDIA’s Blackwell Data Center revenue grew 17% sequentially.

items.title: Industry Leaders Transform Enterprise Data Centers for the AI Era With NVIDIA RTX PRO Servers
items.content_text: NVIDIA today announced leading global enterprises have adopted NVIDIA RTX PRO™ Servers — a new category of enterprise data center infrastructure powered by the RTX PRO 6000 Blackwell Server Edition GPU — speeding the shift from general-purpose computing clusters to AI factory infrastructure, without a complete data center overhaul.

items.title: AlphaGenome: AI for better understanding the genome
items.content_text: Introducing a new, unifying DNA sequence model that advances regulatory variant-effect prediction and promises to shed new light on genome function — now available via API.

items.title: A catalogue of genetic mutations to help pinpoint the cause of diseases
items.content_text:
New AI tool classifies the effects of 71 million ‘missense’ mutations 
Uncovering the root causes of disease is one of the greatest challenges in human genetics. With millions of possible...

items.title: AlphaProteo generates novel proteins for biology and health research
items.content_text: New AI system designs proteins that successfully bind to target molecules, with potential for advancing drug design, disease understanding and more.

items.title: AlphaEvolve: A Gemini-powered coding agent for designing advanced algorithms
items.content_text: New AI agent evolves algorithms for math and practical applications in computing by combining the creativity of large language models with automated evaluators

items.title: AI achieves silver-medal standard solving International Mathematical Olympiad problems

items.title: Millions of new materials discovered with deep learning
items.content_text: We share the discovery of 2.2 million new crystals  –  equivalent to nearly 800 years’ worth of knowledge. We introduce Graph Networks for Materials Exploration (GNoME), our new deep learning tool...

items.title: New Shepard NS-35 Mission Updates | Blue Origin
items.content_text: New Shepard NS-35 is targeting liftoff on Thursday, Sept. 18. The uncrewed payload mission will fly more than 40 scientific and research payloads to space.

items.title: Blue Alchemist Hits Major Milestone Toward Permanent and Sustainable Lunar Infrastructure | Blue Origin
items.content_text: Blue Origin's pioneering in-space resource utilization system, Blue Alchemist, has successfully completed its Critical Design Review, marking a transformative milestone toward humanity's permanent expansion beyond Earth.

items.title: The Mission: Blue Origin’s Mars Telecommunications Orbiter | Blue Origin
items.content_text: Built upon our existing and affordable Blue Ring platform, our Mars Telecommunications Orbiter is ready to support NASA’s Mars mission in 2028.

items.title: Blue Origin’s New Shepard Completes 34th Mission to Space | Blue Origin
items.content_text: Blue Origin successfully completed its 14th human spaceflight and the 34th flight for the New Shepard program.
